Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters

Interface RepeaterMixin

All Superinterfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, MessageTransceiver, Mixin, Nameable, NamedObject, Receiver, Repeater, Transceiver, Transmitter
All Known Subinterfaces:
ComponentMixin, ObjectReader, ObjectSerializer, ObjectWriter, ResourceFolderResolver, ResourceResolver, UncheckedCode<Value>, UncheckedVoidCode
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseStringMap, CaseFoldingStringMap, CoreUnitTest, File.Resolver, Folder.Resolver, GsonObjectSerializer, HttpGetResourceResolver, KryoObjectSerializer, KryoUnitTest, Package.Resolver, PackageResource.PackageResolver, PropertiesObjectSerializer, PropertyMap, Result, StringMap, UnitTest, VariableMap
public interface RepeaterMixin extends Repeater, Mixin
A stateful Mixin that can be used when a class can't extend BaseRepeater to implement the Repeater interface.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      default void addListener(Listener listener, Filter<Transmittable> filter)
      Adds a listener to this broadcaster that wants to receive future messages. This is the mirror method of Listener.listenTo(Broadcaster) as both methods achieve the same thing.

      Note: adding the same listener two or more times will not replace the original listener. To do that, call Broadcaster.clearListeners() before calling this method

      Specified by:
      addListener in interface Broadcaster
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener to broadcast to. Implementations should ignore null listeners.
      filter - The filter to apply

    • clearListeners
